title: Battery Charging Slow since Android 11.
content:
Chaps,

Is anyone elses device charging slowly since updating to Android 11?

Charging time via cable and Pixel Stand are up 50%.

I'm also having a discrepancy between time to full.

On my lock screen, it currently says 1h20m until full (from 40%) but when I go to setting>Battery, it shows 34Mins.

Anyone else?
